settings.hero-main-richtext: Discover Uniquely Crafted Bouquets and Gifts for Any Occasion: Spread Joy with Our Online Flower Delivery Service
settings.hero__description: Experience the joy of giving with our modern floral studio. Order online and send fresh flowers, plants and gifts today.
settings.hero: flex-wrap lg:flex-nowrap lg:flex w-full justify-between items-start lg:hide-scrollbar

settings.heading: Kyiv LuxeBouquets
settings.paragraph: We are a modern local floral studio, which specializes in the design and delivery of unique bouquets. We have the best florists who carefully select each look, our studio cooperates directly with farms for growing different flowers, so we always have fresh flowers, which are collected by our florists in exquisite bouquets.

settings.heading: Stylish bouquets by florists
settings.paragraph: At our floral studio, our professional florists craft the most elegant and stylish bouquets using only the freshest and highest quality materials available. We stay up-to-date with the latest floral design trends and offer unique arrangements that are sure to impress. Let us brighten up your day with our stunning bouquets and same-day delivery service.
settings.tw_content_block: px-4 py-10 md:p-20 border-b border-x border-brand-black
settings.tw_overline: mb-6 lg:mb-[1.7vw] uppercase text-mobile-overline md:text-desktop-overline lg:text-[.98vw]
settings.tw_heading: mb-4 lg:mb-[1.12vw] font-medium text-mobile-heading-3 md:text-desktop-heading-3 lg:text-[2.7vw]
settings.tw_button_text: uppercase text-center block md:inline-block px-6 py-4 border border-brand-black text-mobile-button md:text-desktop-button lg:text-[1.12vw]

settings.heading: On-time delivery
settings.paragraph: Never miss a moment with our on-time flower delivery service. Our couriers will deliver your bouquet personally, without boxes, to ensure it arrives in perfect condition. Trust us to deliver your thoughtful gift reliably.
settings.tw_content_block: px-4 py-10 md:p-20 border-b border-x border-brand-black
settings.tw_overline: mb-6 lg:mb-[1.7vw] uppercase text-mobile-overline md:text-desktop-overline lg:text-[.98vw]

settings.tw_button_text: uppercase text-center block md:inline-block px-6 py-4 border border-brand-black text-mobile-button md:text-desktop-button lg:text-[1.12vw]

settings.heading: Safe payment
settings.paragraph: You can feel secure when placing an order with us, as we use industry-standard security measures to protect your payment information. Your transaction will be safe and hassle-free, so you can shop with confidence.
settings.tw_content_block: px-4 py-10 md:p-20 border-b border-x border-brand-black
settings.tw_overline: mb-6 lg:mb-[1.7vw] uppercase text-mobile-overline md:text-desktop-overline lg:text-[.98vw]
settings.tw_heading: mb-4 lg:mb-[1.12vw] font-medium text-mobile-heading-3 md:text-desktop-heading-3 lg:text-[2.7vw]
settings.tw_button_text: uppercase text-center block md:inline-block px-6 py-4 border border-brand-black text-mobile-button md:text-desktop-button lg:text-[1.12vw]

settings.heading: Subscription by your needs
settings.paragraph: With our subscription service tailored to your specific needs, you can enjoy the convenience of having beautiful bouquets delivered straight to your door at regular intervals. Our flexible service is perfect for busy individuals or those who want to ensure they always have fresh flowers on hand. You'll save time and money with this hassle-free solution to your floral needs.

settings.heading: Flower Subscriptions
settings.paragraph: Experience the convenience and savings of regular flower deliveries with our flexible subscription service - up to 30% more profitable than one-time purchases.
